ValidationRule.description: A Warranty Status cannot be set to Registered unless all checkboxes are completed 2019-11-28 Activated as per CLAIMSV2-288
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( TEXT(Warranty_Status__c) = 'Approved', OR( Confirmation_of_Repairs__c <> true, Proof_of_Purchase__c <> true, Final_Inspection_Report_Letter__c <> true, Roof_Plan__c <> true, Re_Cover_Limited_Warranty_Application__c <> true, Thermoscan_Analysis__c <> true, Details_Roof_Specification__c <> true, ISBLANK( Payment_Received_Date__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This Warranty cannot be registered if any of the required documentation is missing.
